audio_description: As-salamu alaikum. Stop ordering Hyderabadi Chicken Dum Biryani from restaurants now. What's the need when you can make delicious, authentic Hyderabadi Chicken Dum Biryani at home? It’s very easy to make.

audio_description: You’re going to love it a lot. Let’s start making Hyderabadi Biryani. To make Hyderabadi Chicken Dum Biryani, first we need 1 kg of chicken. You can keep the chicken pieces either large or medium in size.
